channel.title: Fire on Dave's Hacks

item.title: Doom Fire on the RS90
item.description: The RS90 or Retromini is a little Gameboy-esque clone that’s been out for a little while, it contains an older Ingenic JZ24725B processor with 32Mb RAM. It’s fairly cheap, I purchased mine from https://retrosix.co.uk/ for Â£24.99. Out of the box it can play Gameboy, Gameboy Color and Gameboy Advance games with it running an OS that’s pretty similar to the old Dingoo A320. Recently pcercuei alongside mth and zear have done some fantastic work and got OpenDingux running on the device.
